mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.name AS "name", a.credential_type AS "credentialType", a.id_num AS "idNum", a.phone AS "phone", a.gender AS "gender", a.home_address AS "homeAddress", a.emergency_contact AS "emergencyContact", a.emergency_contactphone AS "emergencyContactPhone", a.resident_type AS "residentType", a.leave_time AS "leaveTime", a.hotel_id AS "hotel"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resident( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, name, credential_type, id_num, phone, gender, home_address, emergency_contact, emergency_contactphone, resident_type, leave_time, hotel_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{name}, #{credentialType}, #{idNum}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{homeAddress}, #{emergencyContact}, #{emergencyContactPhone}, #{residentType}, #{leaveTime}, #{hotel} )
mapper.update: UPDATE resident SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, name = #{name}, credential_type = #{credentialType}, id_num = #{idNum}, phone = #{phone}, gender = #{gender}, home_address = #{homeAddress}, emergency_contact = #{emergencyContact}, emergency_contactphone = #{emergencyContactPhone}, resident_type = #{residentType}, leave_time = #{leaveTime}, hotel_id = #{hotel} WHERE id = #{id}
